URI of the pool of threads used to process the notifications.
NotificationsCI - Interface in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.interfaces
The component interface NotificationsCI declares the method used to notify a dispatcehr about the current state of a server.
NotificationsCI.StateI - Interface in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.interfaces
The interface StateI must be implemented by the class used to represent the current state of a server.
NotificationsConnector - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.connection
The class StateNotificationConnector implements a connector for the NotificationsCI component interface.
